name: nuget-set-credentials
description: Sets credentials for a NuGet feed (for use with an external feed)
author: Adriaan Thomas

inputs.name: nugetConfigFile
inputs.label: Path to NuGet.config
inputs.helpMarkdown: Equivalent to the `-ConfigFile` `NuGet.exe` command line argument

inputs.name: feedName
inputs.label: NuGet feed name
inputs.helpMarkdown: The name of the NuGet feed to set credentials for. This should appear in `NuGet.config` in `/configuration/packageSources/add/@key`.

inputs.name: userName
inputs.label: Feed user name
inputs.helpMarkdown: The user name to use to authenticate on the feed

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Feed password
inputs.helpMarkdown: The password to authenticate on the feed (this should be a reference to a [secret variable](https://www.visualstudio.com/en-us/docs/build/define/variables#secret-variables), eg `$(MyPassword)`)
